enWisdom: Gratitude is [a means of] increment

Wisdom: النِّعْمَةُ مَوْصُولَةٌ بِالشُّكْرِ وَالشُّكْرُ مَوْصُولٌ بِالْمَزِيدِ وَهُمَا مَقْرُونَانِ فِي قَرْنٍ فَلَنْ يَنْقَطِعَ الْمَزِيدُ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ حَتَّى يَنْقَطِعَ الشُّكْرُ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِ
enWisdom: Blessing is linked to gratitude and gratitude is linked to increase [in blessings], and these two are linked together in one chain, for increase [in blessings] from Allah, the Glorified, will never cease until the gratitude of the thankful one ceases
Be grateful and you will increase
Take advantage of gratitude, for the least of its benefits is increment [of blessings]

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ النَّاسِ بِزِيَادَةِ النِّعْمَةِ أَشْكَرُهُمْ لِمَا أُعْطِيَ مِنْهَا
enWisdom: The most deserving of people for an increase in blessing is the most grateful of them for what he has been granted of it

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى فِي كُلِّ نِعْمَةٍ حَقّاً مِنَ الشُّكْرِ فَمَنْ أَدَّاهُ زَادَهُ مِنْهَا وَمَنْ قَصَّرَ عَنْهُ خَاطَرَ بِزَوَالِ نِعْمَتِهِ
enWisdom: Verily in every blessing there is a right of gratitude to Allah, the Most High, so whoever fulfils it, He increases it for him and whoever does not do so risks losing his blessing
Through gratitude, more is obtained
The fruit of gratitude is increase in blessings
Showing gratitude leads to increment

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الشُّكْرِ مَا كَانَ كَافِلًا بِالْمَزِيدِ
enWisdom: The best gratitude is that which warrants increase
Constant gratitude is the symbol of obtaining increment
The cause of increment is gratitude

Wisdom: شُكْرُ النِّعْمَةِ يَقْضِي [يُفْضِي‏] بِمَزِيدِهَا وَيُوجِبُ تَجْدِيدَهَا
enWisdom: Showing gratitude for blessings results in its increase and leads to its renewal
Gratitude to the Almighty brings forth abundant blessings

Wisdom: شُكْرُ النِّعَمِ يُوجِبُ مَزِيدَهَا وَكُفْرُهَا بُرْهَانُ جُحُودِهَا
enWisdom: Showing gratitude for blessings leads to its increase and showing ingratitude for it is evidence of its reduction
Showing gratitude for blessings multiplies and increases them

Wisdom: شُكْرُكَ لِلرَّاضِي [الرَّاضِيَ‏] عَنْكَ يَزِيدُهُ رِضًا وَوَفَاءً
enWisdom: Your gratitude to the one who is pleased with you increases [his] approval and loyalty (or preservation) towards you
In gratitude there is increase
Gratitude is sufficient for increase
The guarantor of increase is gratitude
Whoever shows gratitude, his blessing lasts [longer]
One whose gratitude increases, his blessings multiply

Wisdom: مَنْ أُلْهِمَ الشُّكْرَ لَمْ يَعْدَمِ الزِّيَادَةَ
enWisdom: One who is inspired to show gratitude will not be deprived of increase

Wisdom: مَنْ حَاطَ النِّعَمَ بِالشُّكْرِ حِيطَ بِالْمَزِيدِ
enWisdom: One who guards (or mixes) blessings with gratitude is surrounded by more [blessings]

Wisdom: مَنْ جَعَلَ الْحَمْدَ خِتَامَ النِّعْمَةِ جَعَلَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مِفْتَاحَ الْمَزِيدِ
enWisdom: Whoever puts praise [for Allah] as the conclusion of a blessing, Allah, the Glorified, makes it the key for more [blessings]
Whoever thanks Allah, He increases [the blessings] for him

Wisdom: مَنْ شَكَرَ النِّعَمَ بِجَنَانِهِ اسْتَحَقَّ الْمَزِيدَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَظْهَرَ عَلَى لِسَانِهِ
enWisdom: One who feels grateful for blessings in his heart deserves increase [even] before he manifests [the gratitude] on his tongue

Wisdom: مَا كَانَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ لِيَفْتَحَ عَلَى أَحَدٍ بَابَ الشُّكْرِ وَيُغْلِقَ عَلَيْهِ بَابَ الْمَزِيدِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not open the door of gratitude for anyone and then close the door of increase [in blessings]
